title: Exciting news!
body: Hi everyone! We have some very exciting news for you...The Moxie will be starting the post-apocalyptic film THE ROAD on December 18! Based on one of the best books written in the past 100 years (my opinion), it's about a father and son trying to survive years after some world-wide catastrophic event. We are very excited! Oh yeah, we also had a baby! His name is Jasper, he weighed 7 pounds, 13 ounces, measured 20 inches in length, and came 15 days early (born on November 24). We think he's the bees knees, even when he keeps us up all night long wanting to eat and fuss. So while we make the transition from a married couple to parents, please be patient if things are a little behind at The Moxie. Our staff does a terrific job running the place, but we might be out of your favorite bottle of wine or peanut butter brownie for a few days. We'll get everything running again smoothly in a couple more weeks. And here's a picture of our little guy!
author: Nicole

comments.author: cooper417
comments.body: Congrats! He's a cute little bugger.  And I promise not to call him a bugger ever again.

Congratulations on parenthood and for bringing one of my personally most-anticipated movies to Springfield.

I love everything about The Moxie -- Ian
